welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Clacton-on-Sea! This charming seaside town is known for its golden beaches, beautiful promenade, and friendly atmosphere. We invite you to explore and make the most of your stay here. Enjoy!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private jet operations and offers a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wethersfield Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
